mapper.select: SELECT a.id id, a.theme_number number, a.contract_address contract_address, a.chain_identification chain_identification, a.price price, a.status status, a.owner_by owner_by, b.id theme_id, b.theme_name name, b.theme_pic picture, b.descrption descrption, b.theme_type type, b.is_resale resale FROM star_nft_theme_number a LEFT JOIN star_nft_theme_info b ON a.series_theme_info_id = b.id WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.is_delete = 0

SELECT a.id number_id, a.theme_number theme_number, a.price price, b.id theme_info_id, b.theme_name theme_name, b.theme_pic theme_pic, b.theme_type theme_type, c.id series_id, c.series_name series_name, a.owner_by owner_by FROM star_nft_theme_number a LEFT JOIN star_nft_theme_info b ON a.series_theme_info_id = b.id LEFT JOIN star_nft_series c ON b.series_id = c.id WHERE a.id = #{themeId} AND a.is_delete = 0 AND a.status = 2 AND a.owner_by = #{ownerBy}

SELECT a.id id, a.theme_number number, a.contract_address contract_address, a.chain_identification chain_identification, a.price price, a.status status, a.owner_by owner_by, b.id theme_id, b.theme_name name, b.theme_pic picture, b.descrption descrption, b.theme_type type, b.is_resale resale FROM star_nft_theme_number a LEFT JOIN star_nft_theme_info b ON a.series_theme_info_id = b.id JOIN (SELECT ROUND(RAND() * ((SELECT MAX(id) FROM star_nft_theme_number) - (SELECT MIN(id) FROM star_nft_theme_number)) + (SELECT MIN(id) FROM star_nft_theme_number)) AS id) AS t2 WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.is_delete = 0 AND a.status = 0 AND a.id >= t2.id ORDER BY a.id LIMIT 1;

SELECT min(price) as price, i.theme_name as `name`, i.theme_pic as image from star_nft_theme_number as n LEFT JOIN star_nft_theme_info as i on i.id = series_theme_info_id WHERE n.`status` = 2 and n.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY series_theme_info_id
SELECT COUNT(1) from star_nft_theme_number WHERE series_theme_info_id = #{themeId} and (`status` = 3 or owner_by = -1 )
SELECT MIN(star_nft_theme_number.price) from star_nft_theme_number WHERE series_theme_info_id = #{themeId}

SELECT tn.id AS num_id, tn.theme_number AS theme_number, tn.chain_identification AS chain_identification, tn.price AS price, tn.owner_by AS owner_by, ti.publish_number AS publish_number, ti.theme_name AS theme_name FROM star_nft_theme_number tn LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, publish_number,theme_name FROM star_nft_theme_info ) ti ON tn.series_theme_info_id = ti.id WHERE series_theme_info_id = #{themeId} AND `status` = 2
ORDER BY tn.theme_number
ORDER BY tn.price

DESC
SELECT round( avg( star_nft_theme_number.price ), 2 ) as price FROM star_nft_theme_number WHERE `status` = 2 AND is_delete = 0 AND series_theme_info_id = #{themeId};

SELECT ti.id id, ti.theme_name `name`, ti.theme_pic image, tn.price `price` FROM star_nft_theme_info ti LEFT JOIN ( SELECT series_theme_info_id AS theme_id, min( price ) AS price FROM star_nft_theme_number WHERE STATUS = 2 GROUP BY theme_id ) AS tn ON ti.id = tn.theme_id WHERE ti.market_open_time <= now() AND ti.is_resale = 1
SELECT id AS themeInfoId, theme_name AS themeName, lssue_price AS floorPrice FROM star_nft_theme_info WHERE market_open_time <= now() AND is_resale = 1 and raising_flag = 1 GROUP BY id
